description.des: 2.Research and suggest new mobile products, applications and protocols.

4.Liaise with Product development team to plan new features.
8.Research and suggest new mobile products, applications and protocols.
9.Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions.
1.Strong Technical candidate with in-depth hands-on experience in Native Mobile Development for both Android and iOS (Add On: Windows UWP app development).
2.Proficiency in programming languages such as Swift, Kotlin, Java and Objective C.
3.Hands-on working experience in cross platform development technologies (React Native, Flutter, Ionic, etc.).
4.Develop technical solutions and architectures for mobile applications and services that align with business goals.
